events.message: I received my package yesterday but the item was not as described and I would like to request a refund for my purchase.
The system has identified the case as a refund request based on the customer's message about wanting their money back.
The refund support specialist has been assigned to handle the customer case to ensure proper assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want a refund for your recent purchase. I'll be happy to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for requesting a refund so I can check the details?
Sure, my order number is 789456123. The product was completely different from the description and unusable.
Thank you for the information. I have processed your refund request, and you should receive the money back within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for your quick response and assistance with the refund. I appreciate your help resolving this matter.
Iâ€™m glad we could resolve your refund issue promptly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is in order. Please contact us if otherwise.
Since your refund has been processed successfully and no further issues were reported, the case will now be closed.
